CustomField.description: If checked, the status of the related/parent/sibling/child agreements will be updated if they are selected while sending for eSignature. Also, the signed documents will be returned back to the related/parent/sibling/child agreement if the Adobe's custom setting for getting signed document as separate is checked.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If checked, the status of the related/parent/sibling/child agreements will be updated if they are selected while sending for eSignature. Also, the signed documents will be returned back to the respective related/parent/sibling/child agreement.
CustomField.label: Update Related Agreements
